    MB Living

    An independent property development company in Staffordshire, MB Living needed a simple two-page website to display a gallery of their work and a list of current builds. The website was designed to offer clear information and large imagery to showcase their high quality developments.

    Services Provided

    Web Design

    Visit Site

    Speed & Optimisation

    Even on small projects, we don’t cut corners – the MB Living website is tested for readability and usability on a wide range of devices and achieves a rare perfect 100 score on Google PageSpeed due to our modern tooling and focus on fast loading times, placing it in the top 0.5% of websites for optimisation. The site loads as quickly as possible when out and about on construction sites, and Google search rankings are improved due to a lower bounce rate.

    100 / 100
    PageSpeed Insights

    < 300ms
    Load Time

    1 Week
